text: Stefania Constantini (born 15 April 1999) is an Italian curler from Cortina d'Ampezzo.2018 Ford World Women's Curling Championship Media Guide She currently plays third on the Italian National Women's Curling Team skipped by Veronica Zappone. She played in the 2016 Winter Youth Olympics.http://www.worldcurling.org/yog2016/teams ==Personal life== Constantini is employed as a shop assistant. ==References== *http://oqe.curlit.com/aspnet/teamDetail.aspx?EventID=2&TeamID;=24 ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female curlers Category:People from Cortina d'Ampezzo Category:Sportspeople from Veneto Category:Competitors at the 2016 Winter Youth Olympics Category:Competitors at the 2019 Winter Universiade
title: Stefania Constantini
